name: Auto Nong
description: Automatically download NONG songs for levels

indexes.name: Indexes
indexes.description:
Auto Nong indexes.
From indexes the mod knows where to fetch the songs from.

show-level-popup.name: Show popup
show-level-popup.description: Shows a popup when a level has a NONG song. Only once per level.

always-show-auto-nong-btn.name:
Always show
Auto Nong button
always-show-auto-nong-btn.description:
Always show the Auto Nong button when entering a level. Even when there are no NONG songs to replace.
This is for adding NONG songs to levels that don't have any.
